# EnglishAuction interface

Represents a new marketplace english-auction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface EnglishAuction
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                   | Modifiers | Type                                | Description                                                                                                                                                                   |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [asset](./sdk.englishauction.asset.md)                                     |           | [NFTMetadata](./sdk.nftmetadata.md) | The asset being auctioned.                                                                                                                                                    |
| [assetContractAddress](./sdk.englishauction.assetcontractaddress.md)       |           | string                              | The address of the asset being auctioned.                                                                                                                                     |
| [bidBufferBps](./sdk.englishauction.bidbufferbps.md)                       |           | number                              | <p>This is a buffer in basis points e.g. x%.</p><p>To be considered as a new winning bid, a bid must be at least x% greater than the current winning bid.</p>                 |
| [buyoutBidAmount](./sdk.englishauction.buyoutbidamount.md)                 |           | string                              | The buyout price of the auction.                                                                                                                                              |
| [buyoutCurrencyValue](./sdk.englishauction.buyoutcurrencyvalue.md)         |           | CurrencyValue                       | The <code>CurrencyValue</code> of the buyout price. Useful for displaying the price information.                                                                              |
| [creatorAddress](./sdk.englishauction.creatoraddress.md)                   |           | string                              | The address of the creator of auction.                                                                                                                                        |
| [currencyContractAddress](./sdk.englishauction.currencycontractaddress.md) |           | string                              | The address of the currency to accept for the auction.                                                                                                                        |
| [endTimeInSeconds](./sdk.englishauction.endtimeinseconds.md)               |           | number                              | The end time of the auction.                                                                                                                                                  |
| [id](./sdk.englishauction.id.md)                                           |           | string                              | The id of the auction                                                                                                                                                         |
| [minimumBidAmount](./sdk.englishauction.minimumbidamount.md)               |           | string                              | The minimum price that a bid must be in order to be accepted.                                                                                                                 |
| [minimumBidCurrencyValue](./sdk.englishauction.minimumbidcurrencyvalue.md) |           | CurrencyValue                       | The <code>CurrencyValue</code> of the minimum bid amount. Useful for displaying the price information.                                                                        |
| [quantity](./sdk.englishauction.quantity.md)                               |           | string                              | <p>The quantity of tokens to include in the auction.</p><p>For ERC721s, this value should always be 1 (and will be forced internally regardless of what is passed here).</p>  |
| [startTimeInSeconds](./sdk.englishauction.starttimeinseconds.md)           |           | number                              | The start time of the auction.                                                                                                                                                |
| [status](./sdk.englishauction.status.md)                                   |           | [Status](./sdk.status.md)           | Whether the listing is CREATED, COMPLETED, or CANCELLED.                                                                                                                      |
| [timeBufferInSeconds](./sdk.englishauction.timebufferinseconds.md)         |           | number                              | <p>This is a buffer e.g. x seconds.</p><p>If a new winning bid is made less than x seconds before expirationTimestamp, the expirationTimestamp is increased by x seconds.</p> |
| [tokenId](./sdk.englishauction.tokenid.md)                                 |           | string                              | The ID of the token to auction.                                                                                                                                               |
